com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model
Class CxServerManager

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxServerManager

public class CxServerManager
extends java.lang.Object

CxServerManager is the class to manage server configurations and active connections.
